summary: Iteration 5 - 6 PILLARS CORE ENGINE: All backend APIs (15/15 tests) and frontend UI components working. Fixed route ordering bug in /api/core/buying-dna/late-customers endpoint.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 6 Pillars of AdhesiveFlow ERP tested and working: 1) Physics Engine - KG/SQM/PCS/MTR conversions working (100 KG = 2717.391 SQM), 2) Production Redline - 7% scrap limit with override queue (WO-20260106-74CF10 at 8%), 3) CRM Buying DNA - Late customer detection working, 4) Multi-Branch Ledger - GST Bridge summary working, 5) Import Bridge - Landed cost calculator working (₹11,85,398 total for $10K FOB), 6) Director Cockpit - All 4 pulse cards and 4 tabs working.

physics_engine.details: KG↔SQM↔PCS↔MTR conversions working. 100 KG = 2717.391 SQM with default tape specs (40µm, 48mm, 65m)

production_redline.details: 7% scrap limit enforced. Override queue shows 1 pending (WO-20260106-74CF10 at 8%)

buying_dna.details: Late customer detection working. Currently shows 'All Customers On Schedule'

gst_bridge.details: Multi-branch GST summary with consolidated view and net payable calculation

import_bridge.details: Landed cost calculator working. $10K FOB = ₹11,85,398 total, ₹1,185/KG, MSP ₹1,363 (15%), RSP ₹1,482 (25%)

director_cockpit.details: 4 pulse cards (Cash, Production, Sales, Override Queue) + 4 tabs (Redline, Physics, Buying DNA, Import Bridge)

customization_page.details: Page loads with Custom Fields, Report Builder, Email Templates, Notifications, API Access, Data Import/Export

bug_fixed.issue: Route ordering bug - /buying-dna/late-customers was being matched by /buying-dna/{customer_id}
bug_fixed.fix: Moved static route /buying-dna/late-customers before dynamic route /buying-dna/{customer_id}
bug_fixed.root_cause: FastAPI matches routes in order, so dynamic route was catching 'late-customers' as customer_id
